events.message: We have received your application for the Software Engineer position at our company and will review it shortly.
Your application has been categorised under the Engineering department focusing on software development roles.
A recruiter experienced in engineering hires has been assigned to your profile for personalized communication.
Your profile matches our initial requirements, and we have completed the initial screening successfully.
Thank you for responding promptly with your availability for the next steps in the interview process.
Your technical interview has been scheduled for May 5th at 2 PM UTC with our senior developer team.
The technical interview concluded successfully; the team was impressed with your knowledge and problem-solving skills.
We have scheduled your HR interview for May 7th at 10 AM UTC to discuss company culture and benefits.
Your HR interview has been completed with positive remarks regarding your fit within our team and company values.
We are pleased to propose you an official offer for the Software Engineer position with competitive benefits.
We have received your positive feedback and acceptance of the offer details as outlined in the proposal.
Congratulations on formally accepting our offer. We look forward to having you on our engineering team.
Your onboarding process has begun. Welcome aboard! We have sent you all the necessary resources to get started.
The recruitment process is now complete, and your hire status is officially closed with all formalities completed.
